mapper.select: SELECT CHA_TYPE_CODE , CHA FROM CHA_TYPE ORDER BY 1
SELECT TALK_AMOUNT_CODE AS CODE , AMOUNT FROM TALK_AMOUNT ORDER BY 1
SELECT INTER_TYPE_CODE AS CODE, INTER FROM INTER_TYPE ORDER BY 1
SELECT U_SPEED_CODE AS CODE, U_SPEED FROM EATINGSPEED ORDER BY 1
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO U_ATTENTION(U_ATTENTION_CODE,REGION_CODE,U_CODE) VALUES('UAC'||LPAD(SEQ_U_ATTENTION_CODE.NEXTVAL,7,'0'),(SELECT REGION_CODE FROM REGION WHERE REGION_NAME=#{user_region}),#{user_code})
mapper.select: SELECT U_CODE AS user_code , U_NICKNAME AS user_nickname FROM U_PRIVATE_DATA WHERE U_ID=#{user_id} AND #{user_pw}=cryptpack.DECRYPT( U_PW,#{user_pw})

SELECT NVL(AC.ATTEND,5) AS attendScore, NVL(MBC.MANNER,5) AS mannerScore, NVL(MBC.BIAS,5) AS biasScore FROM U_ATTEND_SCORE AC JOIN U_MANNER_BIAS_SCORE MBC ON AC.USERCODE = MBC.USERCODE RIGHT JOIN U_PRIVATE_DATA UPD ON MBC.USERCODE = UPD.U_CODE WHERE UPD.U_CODE = #{user_code}
